'''Minacious Isle Mural''' is a Quest Item obtainable from the Event [[World Quest]] "[[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]."  The Quest can be started by interacting with any of the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]]'s Murals.

{{Quote|When these people got shipwrecked, they must have first stayed on this island.|Paimon, after completing [[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]}}
